mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND (USER_STATUS = '1' OR USER_STATUS = '2')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, ADDRESS, USER_PHONE, USER_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, #{address}, #{userPhone}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_PROFILE = #{userProFile} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND (USER_STATUS = '1' OR USER_STATUS = '2')
